definition: bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam

sentences.english: The bird pecked finish, gently comb with rice sleek feathers.
sentences.chinese: 鳥兒啄完稻穀，輕輕梳理着光潤的羽毛。

sentences.english: The short-tempered bird flew away to the sky.
Have you ever watched birds eating on a snowy day?
sentences.chinese: 你曾經看見過鳥兒在雪天裏喫食嗎？

sentences.english: Birds soar in the sky while fishes roam in the sea.
sentences.chinese: 鳥兒翱翔天空，魚兒遨遊大海。

sentences.english: A bird thumped against the window.
sentences.chinese: 一隻鳥兒咚的一聲撞在窗上。

sentences.english: Out in the ocean any floating refuge can save the life of an exhausted bird.
sentences.chinese: 遼闊的大洋上任何浮物都能讓疲累得鳥兒憩息。

sentences.english: The bird is small to winter jasmine, enough to see that they love for spring.
sentences.chinese: 鳥兒很小就來迎春，足以看出它們對春的喜愛。

sentences.english: In the country, he can hear the birds singing and sheep bleating .
sentences.chinese: 在鄉下，他能聽到鳥兒歌唱和羊的叫聲。

sentences.english: Set the bird's wings with gold and it will never again soar in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 把黃金系在鳥翅上，鳥兒將永遠不能翱翔於天際。

sentences.english: Cold doth not sting, the pretty birds do sing.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷不再砭骨，美麗的鳥兒處處啼唱。

sentences.english: Well, some birds may have the same idea.
sentences.chinese: 呵呵，一些鳥兒可能也會這招。

sentences.english: The birds pecked a hole in the sack.
sentences.chinese: 鳥兒把袋子啄出一個洞。

sentences.english: Some reach for cigarettes, or at least the fluffy white fibers found in their filters.
sentences.chinese: 有些鳥兒抓到香菸，發現過濾嘴上有白色的絨毛纖維。

sentences.english: Birds were singing among the trees and an eagle was flying in the sky.
sentences.chinese: 鳥兒在林間鳴囀，一隻老鷹正在空中飛翔。

sentences.english: Tired of watching it sitting unhappy in its cage, Ally set the bird free.
sentences.chinese: 因爲看厭了鳥兒待在籠裏不開心，艾莉把鳥兒放了。

definition: yelling (sound made by person)/barking/braying/roaring (sound made by animals)
to circle in the air/to soar
bird/CL:隻|只[zhi1],群[qun2]/(dialect) to pay attention to/(intensifier) damned/goddam
to spiral/to circle/to go around/to hover/to orbit
